scene_description_enriched: Within a circular frame, a man wearing a wide-brimmed hat and a long beard stands to the left, holding a basket filled with what appears to be fruit or produce. He is draped in a cloak. To the right, a woman with long, flowing hair is seated, her arm extended towards a tree trunk. The scene is set against a textured background, suggesting foliage or a dense natural environment. The overall composition evokes the biblical narrative of Adam and Eve.
